LiveVox Info

LiveVox is the leading provider of cloud contact center solutions. LiveVox offers an integrated hosted predictive dialer, ACD, IVR, call recording and business analytics suite. The patented, fully burstable LiveVox platform utilizes carrier IP/MPLS networks and delivers multi-site deployment, routing and controls. LiveVox is headquartered in San Francisco.
